mapper.select: SELECT oo.member_id , um.nick_name AS username, um.phone , um.create_time , um.invitation_code , oo.created_time , oo.payment_time , oo.end_time , oi.product_name , oo.total_amount , oo.pay_amount , oo.integration_amount , oo.integration, oo.status, oo.order_type FROM oms_order oo LEFT JOIN ums_member um ON oo.member_id = um.id LEFT JOIN oms_order_item oi ON oo.id = oi.order_id
